Download Knopflerfish

Knopflerfish 5.2.0
Knopflerfish 5.2.0 is the current production release. Download
Welcome to the download page for the Knopflerfish OSGi Service Platform. Below are links for downloading the latest production releases of KF5.x. There are also links for downloading production version of KF4, KF3, KF2, and KF1 releases. Older releases are kept in the archive section.

To get the latest development release of Knopflerfish either download a full distribution from the Nightly Builds section, or check out the source code and build it yourself.

Individual bundles can be downloaded from the Bundle repository

All bundles in the Knopflerfish releases are also available as maven artifacts in the Knopflerfish Maven repository.

All Knopflerfish releases are distributed under a BSD style license.

Current Production, Beta, and Maintenance Releases

Archived Releases

Older Knopflerfish releases are available from the the Archived Releases. This page only include current production and maintenance releases.
